Package tv.matchstick.fling

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Fling.ApplicationConnectionResult
    Interface to display current application connection status.
    Fling.FlingApi
    The entry point for interacting with a Fling device.
    Fling.MessageReceivedCallback
    Callback function when received messages from a Fling device
    FlingManager
    Fling Manager interface.
    FlingManager.ApiOptions
    Fling Api options
    FlingManager.ConnectionCallbacks
    Connection callback.
    FlingManager.OnConnectionFailedListener
    Interface for connection failed listener.
    PendingResult<R extends Result>
    This interface used for fling request wait and callback process.
    RemoteMediaPlayer.MediaChannelResult
    Used to present a result of media command which is sent to Fling device
    RemoteMediaPlayer.OnMetadataUpdatedListener
    The listener interface for tracking media meta data changes.
    RemoteMediaPlayer.OnStatusUpdatedListener
    The listener interface for tracking player status changes.
    Result
    Fling Result interface.
    ResultCallback<R extends Result>
    An interface for receiving a Result from a PendingResult as an asynchronous callback.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationMetadata
    Application meta data.
    ConnectionResult
    Fling connection result.
    Fling
    Which will be used by fling application to do all fling actions.
    Fling.FlingApi.FlingApiImpl
    Implementation of FlingApi interface
    Fling.FlingOptions
    Fling options Contained all fling options, for example, application status listener, log flags.
    Fling.FlingOptions.Builder
    A builder to create an instance of Fling.FlingOptions to set API configuration parameters for Fling.
    Fling.Listener
    Interface which will be notified when fling application's status is changed.
    FlingDevice
    Contain all info about a Fling device.
    FlingDevice.Builder
    This is used to create fling device with some device info.
    FlingManager.Builder
    Helper class for FlingApi class
    FlingMediaControlIntent
    Fling media control intent.
    FlingStatusCodes
    All Fling status
    MediaInfo
    Contain all Media informations.
    MediaInfo.Builder
    MediaInfo builder, used to set all staffs of MediaInfo.
    MediaMetadata
    Media meta data.
    MediaStatus
    A class that holds status information about some media.
    RemoteMediaPlayer
    Class for controlling a media player application running on a receiver.
    Status
    Represents the results of work.
